name: BBDN-REST 400
description: A Python-based demo of Blackboard Learn REST APIs.

FLASK_SECRET_KEY.description: The standard flask secret key for session storage security

CONSUMER_KEY_SECRET.description: OAuth1 Secret for LTI authentication to match `__consumer_key__` consumer name

CONSUMER_KEY_PEM_FILE.description: If you need to do SSL authentication on top of regular OAUTH, paste in your plain text base64 encoded SSL certificate and private key
